inclusion.criterion: Vitamin D level less than 20 ng/dl
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: The patient's serum vitamin D level is not specified, but it can be inferred that it is likely below 20 ng/ml based on the context.

exclusion.criterion: Vitamin D deficiency (VDD) has resurfaced as a significant public health problem in recent years.
exclusion.label: triggers
exclusion.evidence: The text mentions that VDD is prevalent despite adequate sunshine throughout the year, and that it is considered a common problem in children.

exclusion.criterion: There are several areas of controversy which has great relevance for the investigators community like what level of vitamin D should be considered as deficiency.
exclusion.label: triggers
exclusion.evidence: The text mentions that there is no universally accepted method of correcting VDD, and that different strategies have been studied.

exclusion.criterion: In US the available preparation is 50,000 units of ergocalciferol, given weekly or three times per week for total of 300,000 units.
exclusion.label: triggers
exclusion.evidence: The text mentions that this is a common treatment for VDD in the US.

notes: Patient has Paget's Disease of Bone and will be prescribed Bisphosphonate as first-line therapy. Vitamin D levels along with other biochemical parameters will be checked at regular intervals.
